data.text: A buevi, beno bapfumu, mu busonga lueti yolukilanga e ?
Nana ! Mu mintima mieno, lueti yindula makambulu masonga
Tona mu mbutukulu, batu bambimbi beti zimbala ;
Mitsa miawu midi banga mitsa mi nioka,
kinkambu wa mbembo yi batu bansakisanga zinioka ;
Kola meno mu miunu miawu, a Nzambi ;
Bika balalakana banga maza ma nkumba !
banga khodi yinsiuta bu yilembo diati ;
Tuamina zinzungu zieno zimona diamu di zitsendi
